metadata.title: CVE-2024-50103 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  ASoC: qcom: Fix NULL Dereference in asoc_qcom_lpass_cpu_platform_probe()  A devm_kzalloc() in asoc_qcom_lpass_cpu_platform_probe() could possibly return NULL pointer. NULL Pointer Dereference may be triggerred without addtional check. Add a NULL check for the returned pointer.
